note.note-paragraph: Groups E05B77/00 to E05B85/28 do not correspond to former or current IPC groups. Concordance CPC : IPC for these groups is as follows: - E05B77/00 to E05B85/28 : E05B65/12

title-part.text: Parts of locks or the like mountable on or in wings

Knobs or handles which do not operate the bolt or lock, e.g. non-movable; Mounting thereof

reference.text: motorcycle helmets A42B3/0413, B62J11/005; gun racks A47B81/005; showcases with theft protection A47F3/002; anti-theft means for peg-boards, grids or rods for hanging merchandise A47F5/0861; show stands, hangers, shelves with provision against unauthorised removal A47F7/024; for self-service hand-carts A47F10/04; locking skis A63C11/004; locking bolts, nuts or pins F16B41/00

CPC-specific-text.text: for office machines, e.g. PC`s, portable computers, typewriters, calculators

title-part.text: being lockable or unlockable by means of the office machine itself, e.g. by its keyboard

CPC-specific-text.text: Vehicle locks for special use or applications

reference.text: E05B71/00 takes precedence; locking arrangements for non-fixed vehicle roofs B60J7/185; safety locks for back-rests B60N2/433

title-part.text: Locks for glove compartments, console boxes, fuel inlet covers or the like
